languages.text: "В отсек СЛ-М18. А цепи, чтоб вы у тамошних станков трудились и бежать не вздумали. Вы ж хотели работы — получайте".
"Bay SL-M18. And the chains are to make sure that when you get there, you man the machinery and make no attempt to escape. You wanted work, you've got it."
languages.original_text: "В отсек СЛ-М18. А цепи, чтоб вы у тамошних станков трудились и бежать не вздумали. Вы ж хотели работы — получайте".

traits.locale_text: "Bay SL-M18. And the chains are to make sure that when you get there, you man the machinery and make no attempt to escape. You wanted work, you've got it."
"Bay SL-M18. And the chains are to make sure that when you get there, you man the machinery and make no attempt to escape. You wanted work, you've got it."
"Bay SL-M18. And the chains are to make sure that when you get there, you man the machinery and make no attempt to escape. You wanted work, you've got it."
"Bay SL-M18. And the chains are to make sure that when you get there, you man the machinery and make no attempt to escape. You wanted work, you've got it."
"Bay SL-M18. And the chains are to make sure that when you get there, you man the machinery and make no attempt to escape. You wanted work, you've got it."
"Bay SL-M18. And the chains are to make sure that when you get there, you man the machinery and make no attempt to escape. You wanted work, you've got it."
"Bay SL-M18. And the chains are to make sure that when you get there, you man the machinery and make no attempt to escape. You wanted work, you've got it."

languages.text: "Modul SL-M18. Und die Ketten sorgen nach Eurer Ankunft dafür, dass Ihr die Maschinen bemannt und nicht auf dumme Gedanken kommt. Ihr wolltet Arbeit, jetzt habt ihr sie."
languages.original_text: "Bay SL-M18. And the chains are to make sure that when you get there, you man the machinery and make no attempt to escape. You wanted work, you've got it."

traits.locale_text: "Modul SL-M18. Und die Ketten sorgen nach Eurer Ankunft dafür, dass Ihr die Maschinen bemannt und nicht auf dumme Gedanken kommt. Ihr wolltet Arbeit, jetzt habt ihr sie."

languages.text: « Baie SL-M18. Et les chaînes nous permettront de nous assurer qu'une fois là-bas, vous servirez les machines sans jamais tenter de vous enfuir. Vous vouliez du travail ? Vous voilà servis. »
languages.original_text: "Bay SL-M18. And the chains are to make sure that when you get there, you man the machinery and make no attempt to escape. You wanted work, you've got it."

traits.locale_text: « Baie SL-M18. Et les chaînes nous permettront de nous assurer qu'une fois là-bas, vous servirez les machines sans jamais tenter de vous enfuir. Vous vouliez du travail ? Vous voilà servis. »

languages.text: «A la Bahía SL-M18. Las cadenas son para que cuando lleguemos os apliquéis en manejar la maquinaria sin intentar escapar. ¿Queríais trabajo? Lo tendréis».
languages.original_text: "Bay SL-M18. And the chains are to make sure that when you get there, you man the machinery and make no attempt to escape. You wanted work, you've got it."

traits.locale_text: «A la Bahía SL-M18. Las cadenas son para que cuando lleguemos os apliquéis en manejar la maquinaria sin intentar escapar. ¿Queríais trabajo? Lo tendréis».

languages.text: 「ベイSL-M18だ。それから鎖は、そこに着いた後、お前が機械類を操作して逃げ出そうとしないようにするためのものだ。仕事をしたがっていたのだ。仕事をくれてやる」
languages.original_text: "Bay SL-M18. And the chains are to make sure that when you get there, you man the machinery and make no attempt to escape. You wanted work, you've got it."

traits.locale_text: 「ベイSL-M18だ。それから鎖は、そこに着いた後、お前が機械類を操作して逃げ出そうとしないようにするためのものだ。仕事をしたがっていたのだ。仕事をくれてやる」

languages.text: “去SL-M18号甲板，这些链子是为了确保你到了之后会老老实实操作机器，不会打算逃跑。你不是想干活吗？现在你有活干了。”
languages.original_text: "Bay SL-M18. And the chains are to make sure that when you get there, you man the machinery and make no attempt to escape. You wanted work, you've got it."

traits.locale_text: “去SL-M18号甲板，这些链子是为了确保你到了之后会老老实实操作机器，不会打算逃跑。你不是想干活吗？现在你有活干了。”

languages.text: "SL-M18 Bölmesi'ne. Zincirler de oraya gidince makinelerin başına geçeceğinizden ve kaçmaya çalışmayacağınızdan emin olmak için. İş istiyordunuz, alın size iş."
languages.original_text: "Bay SL-M18. And the chains are to make sure that when you get there, you man the machinery and make no attempt to escape. You wanted work, you've got it."
